greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Reversing binary representation of A004718, Per Nørgård's "infinity sequence".
comment: The composer Per Nørgård's name is also written in the OEIS as Per Noergaard.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65536
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: A004718list(up_to) = { my(v=vector(up_to)); v[1]=1; v[2]=-1; for(n=3, up_to, v[n] = if(n%2, 1+v[n>>1], -v[n/2])); (v); }; \\ After code in A004718.
xref: Cf. A004718, A048724, A065620, A065621, A083866 (positions of zeros), A323907 (rgs-transform), A323909.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 09 2019
